review.title: “fun place to work”
review.pros: Pros – beautiful winery with a lot of fun thinggs to do.
review.cons: Cons – very detail oriented, but far away from the freeway
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Some advice for working at Korbel is to be very detailed oriented. work hard. be on time. punctuality is a must.

review.title: “Beautiful Setting out in redwood country”
review.pros: Pros – Very good at training employees. Loved the 10:30 am break where donuts and fruit were provided and you could relax and socialize. Production managers would also break at this time and would share the table with you.
review.cons: Cons – Very strict. Think of Prussian military. Time is crucial. Don't ever clock in a minute late, you will have a meeting with your supervisor. I would recommend to a friend, but with the reservation that you have to be good at what you do, detail oriented and be prepared to be treated like a number. They don't seem to appreciate their employees other than give them a paycheck.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Work to make a company priority that employees are courteous to each other. Reducing that kind of friction would improve productivity, attitudes and the bottom line and would not cost much.
